Sample size : According non-inferiority analysis , 129 pregnant woman need arm . Main Outcome : sPTB < 34,0 < 37,0 week gestation . Secondary Outcomes : Pregnancy outcomes neonatal composite morbidity . Expected Results : Perinatal outcomes similar intervention control group although intervention group use QUIPP tool require less medical resource .
